title: BitGaming
blurb: Provably fair Bitcoin gaming: Lightning microstakes, on-chain settlements, and verifiable randomness.
description: BitGaming is a modular stack for Bitcoin-native games. It supports Lightning for instant microstakes, on-chain settlement paths, and verifiable randomness via commitâ€“reveal, VRF, or BitRNG beacons.
